title: I still don't have access to my club.
body:
I know a while ago a lot was going on with the clubs and many club owners could not access their clubs. I sent in a ticket to riot support and they told me that they are aware of the problem and are trying to work out a fix. However, its been a few months and I still can't access my club (which I own). My friends still see my name on the club roster, however I cannot access that club or use the club tag. I was just wondering if anyone knows how to fix this. 

Club name: †The Breakfast Club†   _(the † is an alt code "alt 0134")_
Club tag: .m./
My username: tbkicker

replies.body: Back around the time of your ticket, we were still investigating issues resulting from a [club outage](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/nMisJPK8-clubs-outage-oct-2016).   The issue should now be resolved, so we'd like to take a look at your specific issue to see what's going on.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can assist individually.  We'll reply back asap!
